name: Heterogeneous Transfer Learning
description: Heterogeneous transfer learning is characterized by the source and target domains having differing feature spaces, but may also be combined with other issues such as differing data distributions and label spaces.
x_kb_article:
## References
Wang, Q., Mao, K. Z., Wang, B., & Guan, J. (2017). Big data clustering by hybrid optimization algorithm. Journal of Big Data, 4(1), 25. [Link](https://journalofbigdata.springeropen.com/articles/10.1186/s40537-017-0089-0).
